.. _LS:

LS
==

**Description:**
Lists all the stream ids matching wildcard pattern.

Arguments
---------

+-------------+------------+---------------------------------------------------------------+
| Name        | Type       | Description                                                   |
+=============+============+===============================================================+
| pattern     | ``string`` | Wildcard pattern to match against.                            |
+-------------+------------+---------------------------------------------------------------+

Dependencies
------------
- ``NONE``

Output
------

+------------+-----------------------------------------------------+
| Type       | Description                                         |
+============+=====================================================+
| ``list``   | List of stream ids that match the wildcard pattern. |
+------------+-----------------------------------------------------+

Example
-------

.. code-block:: none

   LS '*'
